General.Name: Alpha Modus Holdings, Inc
General.Description: Alpha Modus Holdings, Inc. engages in creating, developing, and licensing data driven technologies to enhance consumers in-store digital experience at the point of decision in the United States. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Cornelius, North Carolina.
General.Address: 20311 Chartwell Center Drive, Cornelius, NC, United States, 28031
